website_summaries.verdict: A large, high-quality outdoor evaporative cooler that is designed for use in open rooms, decks, patios, garages, and backyards.
pros: This evaporative cooler can move air up to 29 feet, the water compartment is conveniently located on the top, and it can be connected to a hose for a continuous water supply
The unit does not produce a mist and it comes with a 1-year limited warranty
cons: This model is a bit noisy when it runs, so if sound bothers you, this might not be the unit for you

customer_reviews.title: In a dry climate, works great indoors or outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: It works great outdoors if you are sitting right in front of it in AZ when it's over 100F outside. Indoors in AZ, it works great and you don't need to sit right in front of it. It's so dry here there is no need to crack a window or sliding door. Our downstairs AC failed and it was a lifesaver to be able to hangout in the kitchen and family room with this unit. We originally only planned to use it outdoors and it will return there once we get our new AC installed. We plan to combine it outdoors with a mister.
customer_reviews.author: Howard and Shikha

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, waste of time and money !!
customer_reviews.text: Ran this item for 3 weeks , cleaned it 2x and now the pump stopped working. Had a continuous water supply to this cooler so I know it never ran without a sufficient amount of water. One person said in their review that this item was" built like a tank" Really ? I guess they don't know how a tank is built !!! Junk , don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: saldogg33

customer_reviews.title: five stars
customer_reviews.text: we live in south texas needless to say HOT HOT HOT we like to sit outside and enjoy our back yard. it literally was unbearable, we decided we would try this cooler to see if it made a big enough difference and i am happy to say it really has we can sit outside and enjoy the porch it actually decreases the temperature by bout 20 degrees . really is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: ) turned on cool function and water commenced spitting out the front
customer_reviews.text: honeywell really screwed the pooch on this one. out of the box very noisey fan , as in hitting the inside shroud(?) turned on cool function and water commenced spitting out the front. quite different from the " product description . oh! in small letters on the bottom of the box " made in china" don't buy!! they know nothing about "manufacturing fit and finish" and this item did not possess that quality.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth j maccarone

customer_reviews.title: Not feeling any cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday and today I filled the water to just below the max line and turned on the cooler. Nothing happened. No noise. No pump. Only when I turned on the fan did I hear anything. It’s now been on level 3 with the cooler setting in and I’m still not feeling my garage any cooler. What am I doing wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Philip A

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my garage for a hot day in Buckeye AZ. On a105 degree day and 12% humidity my garage is 90 with a nice humid breeze. Very easy to move and lasts several hours without hooking up the water hose. Well made, good product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Thomas

customer_reviews.title: in excellent condition and are what I expected as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, in excellent condition and is what I expected as advertised. I am happy with all the items I have received from Amazon. I removed the 6 screws on the back of the cooler and was pleased to find the water pan was just like the old swamp cooler when I was a kid. I think the trick to this will be to just place some mini ice blocks in the pan to keep the water as cold as possible. Take care not to strip or over tighten the screws. All this unit needs is TLC and ICE COLD WATER.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Miller

customer_reviews.title: Problems on the
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my garage gym the 1st one I got was crushed had to return the 2nd 1 no matter what hose I use in the unit it leaks so I have to fill only from the top I am considering whether to keep or return
customer_reviews.author: Mona Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: We have used the unit several times. Do not expect to get super cold air blowing out but it does cool the area where we sit in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Katheleen Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Been very happy with this. Pads are not cheap but they do well. I'm using it outside for my chickens and have to change-out the pads about every three weeks--but I can put in one set and then clean the other (hose off, immerse in vinegar overnight, hose off). Has kept my chickens alive.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonbrain

customer_reviews.title: Pump stopped working at 2 months old
customer_reviews.text: Pump died at less than 2 months old. Update, Honeywell entirely unresponsive, calls are not answered. Last Honeywell product I buy! Doesn't deserve even 1 star
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of water!
customer_reviews.text: Rolls really easily, holds a lot of water. Blows really nicely. We love it, makes our two bedroom apartment so much cooler. Better than our little wall AC unit.
customer_reviews.author: PattonS3

customer_reviews.title: Lots of air flow
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cool air flow I absolutely would recommend this. It's hot down here in Louisiana and is a cool relief outside on my porch!!!!
customer_reviews.author: papalavall

customer_reviews.title: Ice feature makes it even cooler
customer_reviews.text: On front and back porch’s in Texas 100 degrees or more bought one 3 years ago and a new one this year cools me down at least 20 degrees
customer_reviews.author: William box

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Has been a lifesaver in the heat. Good price, fast shipping and great performance.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Fink

customer_reviews.title: Good indoor use in the garage and house
customer_reviews.text: Good indoor use in the garage and house. Plenty of air movement with tolerable noise. One input would be to design a better wheel since it is a little top heavy. OK for hard surfaces but a little awkward on carpet. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery T. Jorna

customer_reviews.title: Cools very nicely! We are using it in a 450 square ...
customer_reviews.text: Cools very nicely! We are using it in a 450 square foot room.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to AC
customer_reviews.text: Good powerful cooling fan. Need to see hotter weather to see the full effect of the hydrating air cooling. Im in New England and do not expect the same cooling as if i lived in Arizona. Item is attractive and not bulky even though it is not small. Wheels around quite easily. Panels remove very easily for cleaning often which is highly recommended. Think I am going to enjoy this .
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Segretario

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy, very large and plastic construction. Was ...
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy, very large and plastic construction. Was a failure at cooling in Colorado in a dry climate. My daughter, who swelters in her upstairs bedroom with weak whole house air conditioning, gave up on this unit after a few weeks of trying.
customer_reviews.author: KD Boulder, CO

customer_reviews.title: Does I good job cooling a large room
customer_reviews.text: More than what I expected. Does a good job cooling a large room. We live in a dry climate and that is where this type of cooler works well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as it say. Do wwhat it suppose to do. Thank
customer_reviews.author: Cung N.

customer_reviews.title: with the first one being pretty strong.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the loud side and the airflow seems to be difficult to regulate with only 3 speeds, with the first one being pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin D. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: I use to run with my ac make my room cool and save my electric bill
customer_reviews.text: I lover it,I use to run with my ac make my room cool and save my electric bill low
customer_reviews.author: P Patana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this portable a/c is wonderful, just add water and you can be cooler i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Weed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than older evaporative cooler but not quite as cold
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES D BLACKSTONE III

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! We use them to cool the rabbits in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! We use them to cool the rabbits in San Diego's first rabbit-only shelter. The coolers are quiet, efficient, and help bring the temperatures down to safe level's for the shelter's rabbits. Easy to fill and maintain, these are a hit!
customer_reviews.author: San Diego House Rabbit Society

customer_reviews.title: Only if you live in Arizona
customer_reviews.text: I know the listing says that this isn't good in humid locations, but I don't think of Oregon as all that humid. There was water running down my windows in rivulets.
customer_reviews.author: S. O. Rooney MA GGCP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it did not provide any cooling, just a light mist behind an extremely XXL fan. Disappointed. We called it the Behemoth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing thermostat and timer features
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of cooling. Hose attachment is really useful to have water refill automatically. Only improvement I could think of is to put a thermostat on it so that it can automatically turn on at a specified temperature or put timer on it so that it can automatically turn on at a given time. If they added the thermostat and timer then the unit would be 100% self operating. Since this unit doesn't have a thermostat or a timer it still needs human intervention despite having a hose attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Software Engineer

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without mine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I live in San Diego by the Bay Area so while humid at times really climate is more dry compared to other states. I have a door to the outside from bedroom and place there and run all night, it feels like close to a/c but yet not the same. I use in living room cools down during the hottest spot of the day. It is loud, but well worth it, a/c is also loud. It's not a/c so obviously not the same but if u sit it close proximity it feels very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lady shopper

customer_reviews.title: My Dad really like this...
customer_reviews.text: He said it really cools his house but the only thing he complained about was it is too loud and the air blows too hard. Otherwise, he said he likes it and it keeps his house cool
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of projects in our garage but with the summer heat it was just too hot. This works perfectly! We can now work all day and stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: In a dryer climate, this thing ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I use it in the garage by my workbench. It keeps the end of the garage nice and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel

customer_reviews.title: Not a HONEYWELL authorized dealer = no warranty
customer_reviews.text: This is not an authorized Honeywell dealer. The product had a whole on the bottom and that made the water pour out the system. It was easily patched by me. Then, it stopped working days later and I tried to file a claim with Honeywell but was told that since this was purchased through this dealer, the one year warranty doesn't apply
customer_reviews.author: Bryant & Marko

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE the restocking fee if you return
customer_reviews.text: Tried it but it only made the room feel like a hot humid jungle. Returned it but they charged me a $100 restocking fee. BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Otanez

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit for my garage when I am working in there whenever out here in Arizona. The unit works well, it puts out plenty of cooler air and is the perfect size for my 3 car garage. Fan could be more powerful but no biggy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt cool very well
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent fan but it doesn't do much on the way of cooling. I have it in my 400 ft^2 garage. It maintains the ambient temperature or maybe cools a degree or two but not what I was expecting for sure. Not really worth $300 USD.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to freezing A/C
customer_reviews.text: This swamp cooler is amazing. We have not needed to use our A/C all summer. Put it in front of our upstairs bedroom window and it cools the whole second floor. Refilling the water reservoir is easy by buckets or a hose hooked up to your sink. Get this-you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: judki

customer_reviews.title: Even in my room at night with the door shut and a window open it won't cool. Looked around for a lot of ways to ...
customer_reviews.text: The water pump went out in a week, very noisy, doesn't push much air. I live in a hot dry low humidity area, I have tried one window open, one door open, one window at one end of the room open and one behind the cooler open at the same time. Even in my room at night with the door shut and a window open it won't cool. Looked around for a lot of ways to use this swamp cooler to be most efficient, including the manufacturers recommendations. It was not that cheap and I have no other alternative so I am still trying to work it out. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked a pump only option to keep the pads wet otherwise a very nice product
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price, good quality. Much more efficient than an air conditioner
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: gREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: LIKE THIS COOLER VERY MUCH , AND WOULD BUY IT AGAIN. I USE IT FOR MY SHOP , WHICH IS ABOUT 500 SQ. FT. AND IT COOLS IT OFF GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: patrick l. powell

customer_reviews.title: Even the low fan setting is noisier than I was able to tolerate.
customer_reviews.text: This unit has features that I like. It has a very convenient top water feed. This unit is fairly large. I wanted something that really worked and this seemed to be the closest unit to fit the bill. However, I returned it due to the noise level. The fan has three settings. Even the lowest setting is fairly powerful and too noisy to use indoors. It would work great outside, in a garage, or inside if handling heat is significantly more important than using a phone or watching TV. Even though this is illustrated indoors; this is an outdoor unit. I am afraid that even smaller units will be noisier than what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Scrub Jay

customer_reviews.title: We're really happy with this fan/cooler
customer_reviews.text: We're really happy with this fan/cooler. It was perfect to keep our patio cool in very hot weather, a lifesaver. At first we were dumping RO water into it to maybe cut down on the mineral buildup. That was too much work, and it has a big tank to keep full, maybe 10 gallons. But seeing how it works, with a pump to circulate the water, I don't think minerals will build up. So we hooked a garden hose to it, worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: jbdind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. cools most all of the house. no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill J.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet advertised expectations. Have had difficulty returning it
customer_reviews.author: Carlos S.

customer_reviews.title: did it cool any area by even one degree
customer_reviews.text: I ran this unit for five hours, trying various fan and open window combinations. It went thru several pints of water, but never, in any configutation or setup, did it cool any area by even one degree. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: James Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: One of the air directional louvers doesn't work. The unit spits large amounts of water out of the front which quickly wets all surfaces in front of it. UPDATE: Don't bother trying to contact the manufacture if you have a defective unit. They will tell you to just contact the seller for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried it in a 2 car garage in Arizona. ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried it in a 2 car garage in Arizona. Garage was very hot before, but after running the cooler, garage was still very hot AND became extremely humid. and uncomfortable. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: sage

product_meta.title: Honeywell CO48PM Evaporative Air Cooler For Indoor & Outdoor Use, 1062 CFM - 10.6 Gallon Tank
product_meta.description: Spend more time outdoors with Honeywell Outdoor Evaporative Coolers (Swamp Coolers) keeping you and your family cool all summer long. Outdoor Fans help to circulate warm air, Outdoor Mist Fans cool by spraying wet mist over your furniture and serving area. Honeywell Outdoor Evaporative Coolers provide a powerful cool breeze without wetting you and your guests. Like a breeze flowing across a lake, Honeywell Evaporative Coolers provide a natural, cool breeze with the power of water evaporation. Honeywell Evaporative Coolers combine 3 appliances: Evaporative air cooler, fan and humidifier - into one compact energy-saving system. A fan alone creates a breeze by recirculating warm air, but when you add water and/ice to the tank, Honeywell Evaporative Coolers reduce the temperature of incoming warm air, transforming it into a cool moist breeze. Honeywell Portable Air Coolers are built to last and carefully crafted with the science of aerodynamics to minimize energy consumption while maximizing the airflow. An evaporative air cooler offers an energy efficient cooling option when the air is hot with low humidity, such as desert areas like the southwestern United States (recommended humidity level is 60% or less for maximum efficiency).cfm1062
feature_bullets: Product Dimensions: 24.4" W 14.8" D 34.8" H | Product Weight: 30.9 lbs
Recommended for area up to 610 sq. ft.
Backyard BBQ's, pool parties, relaxing on the porch, garden or deck—an outdoor evaporative air cooler beats the summer's heat and keeps the good times rolling.
US Compliant, Outdoor-Rated Honeywell Swamp Cooler with UV resistant material & GFCI cord for safe outdoor operation.

Built to cool large spaces with minimal effort! Top loading ice compartment with a continuous water hose connection & triple-sided Honeywell Honeycomb Cooling Pads means powerful evaporative cooling all day long.
Like a cool, lake breeze, Evaporative Air cooler reduces temperature through water evaporation. Moist, cool breeze can cool you down without spraying floor & furniture with water!
Built-to-Last, Honeywell Air Coolers have been leading the industry with their quality products for over 12 years.
